name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Engineer with 10+ years of experience in leveraging **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, **React.js**, **Next.js**, and **Nest.js** to deliver top-notch software solutions. Proven expertise in **GraphQL** API development, end-to-end testing, and implementing **Agile** methodologies for efficient team collaboration and problem-solving. Demonstrated ability to optimize performance and adhere to clean code practices while enhancing user experience. Hands-on experience in building and deploying cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, with a strong background in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation.

Expert in integrating AI/ML capabilities for real-time analytics and automation, utilizing tools such as **Langchain**, **Pinecone**, and MLOps technologies like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** to drive impactful solutions. Committed to developing secure and maintainable systems that meet industry compliance standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and implemented **API development** using **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, and **Nest.js**, ensuring clean code practices and high performance across scalable applications in healthcare and finance.
• Developed dynamic user experiences and responsive interfaces leveraging **React.js** and **Next.js**, focusing on user experience design and optimal performance.
• Integrated **GraphQL** for efficient data retrieval and manipulation, enhancing collaboration between front-end and back-end development teams.
• Led agile methodology practices within the team to enhance collaboration and improve problem-solving strategies, resulting in a **30%** reduction in development time for feature releases.
• Established robust end-to-end testing frameworks utilizing tools such as Jest and Cypress, achieving **95%** test coverage and ensuring high-quality deliverables across all services.
• Enhanced application performance through optimized coding practices and performance optimization strategies, resulting in a **40%** improvement in load times.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and deliver a microservices architecture, improving system reliability and facilitating a seamless deployment process.
• Managed state effectively in applications using **Langchain** and integrations with modern libraries, ensuring efficient data flow and user interactivity.
• Created comprehensive documentation and maintained clean code practices to improve team onboarding and facilitate knowledge sharing.
• Participated in code reviews, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and maintaining high standards for clean code and software craftsmanship.

Led the implementation of **Node.js** (Nest.js) and **TypeScript** frameworks to develop scalable microservices architecture for financial platforms, improving system throughput by **30%** for high-volume transactions.
Designed and developed responsive and user-friendly front-end applications with **React.js** (18) and **Next.js**, employing Agile methodology and performance optimization techniques, resulting in a **25%** increase in user satisfaction ratings.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance user experience design, successfully integrating **GraphQL** for efficient data fetching, which reduced loading times by **15%** across applications.
Engineered real-time analytics dashboards employing **React.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, facilitating anomaly detection and strategic decision-making for operational teams managing high-value transactions.
Implemented asynchronous communication using **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, establishing an event-driven architecture that streamlined compliance workflows and reduced processing delays by **20%**.
Built ETL pipelines utilizing Python, Apache Airflow, and Azure Data Factory, enabling efficient ingestion and processing of financial data from **3** internal and external sources on a daily basis.
Leveraged AI/ML tools such as scikit-learn and Azure Machine Learning for the development of advanced fraud detection systems, reducing fraudulent transaction rates by **40%** through proactive monitoring.
Architected ML pipelines for credit scoring and churn prediction, integrating with backend services to facilitate real-time decision-making, enhancing the financial service delivery.

• Developed and optimized backend services as a **Senior Fullstack Engineer** using **Node.js** (with **Nest.js**) and **TypeScript**, ensuring high performance in e-commerce applications serving up to **1 million** users.
• Created RESTful and **GraphQL** APIs for seamless data interactions, achieving a response time improvement of **30%** for client requests.
• Engineered innovative solutions employing **React.js** and **Next.js** to build responsive, fast-loading user interfaces that improved user engagement by **25%**.
• Collaborated in an **Agile methodology** environment with cross-functional teams to effectively deliver features that meet user needs and project timelines.
• Implemented rigorous **end-to-end testing** strategies that enhanced application reliability and reduced bug incidences by **40%**.
• Adhered to clean code practices and conducted code reviews, fostering a culture of maintainability and performance optimization within the development team.
• Utilized modern design principles to enhance user experience through intuitive UI/UX design, improving customer satisfaction ratings by **15%**.
• Actively engaged in collaboration with product owners and stakeholders to solve complex technical challenges and deliver valuable solutions in a fast-paced setting.
• Leveraged **Langchain**, **Pinecone**, and LLM-based development alongside emerging technologies to explore and implement advanced functionalities in projects.

skills:

	PostgreSQL (Fintech), MySQL (Healthcare), MongoDB (Gaming), Redis

**DevOps:**
	Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD, Terraform, Ansible, Helm, Docker Compose

**Cloud & Infrastructure:**
	AWS, Azure

**Other:**
	MLflow, Airflow, Kubeflow, Keycloak (OIDC, RBAC), JWT, OAuth2, Let’s Encrypt, Nginx, Certbot, Langchain, Pinecone, LLM-based development, End-to-end testing, Agile methodology, Collaboration, Problem-solving, Performance optimization, Clean code practices, User experience design
